data.title: Bill Duke Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Bill Duke on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Bill Duke including Predator, Payback, and more.
data.text:
Intersecting Lives

A corrections officer (Garrett) is arrested for sexually assaulting female inmates in and out of prison, and the union that supports him targets Barba (RaÃºl Esparza) and the SVU.

Heartfelt Passages

When the investigation of Corrections Officer Gary Munson (guest star Brad Garrett) deepens, he and his union take drastic actions that threaten the lives of ADA Barba (RaÃºl Esparza) and the SVU squad.

Every Man for Himself

Sawyer discovers just how far his captors will go to thwart any plans of escape he and Kate might have, and Jack is called upon to scrub up in order to save the life of one of "The Others." Meanwhile, Desmond's behavior begins to perplex the survivors when he starts construction on an unknown device.

Street Money

Rush and the team investigate the 2005 murder of a young, up-and-coming African-American politician who vowed to rid the lower-class neighborhood he grew up in of drug dealers who prey on young kids.
